channel.title: Dungeon World - Nentir Vale (May-June Series)
channel.description:
Dungeon World - Nentir Vale (May-June Series)
No Previous experience with Dungeon World or PBTA is required.
System : Dungeon World. = Bonds evolve, 1 Xp each change. Setting : Nentir Vale (Generic fantasy setting from 4e D&D) = Flavoured with Gauntlet Group Codex stuff *
* The game will be recorded on Youtube. * THE X-CARD will also be in use. * Will be multiple sessions, will try to weave in ongoing/non-ongoing stories in fun ways.
1 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MzIjuD8JO3_deKqdNYJ 2 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MzIkH2IPpmJTWUSnltV 3 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MzIkkZeZIhvMWyz2N1C 4 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MzIl7CDFEQAJCBfH24v 5 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MzIlXXuaKM549S5iAsH 6 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MzIltquWYlm920jWreH 7 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MzImJK_g1KVN5OspY1m 8 - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MzInLwn1e5WcvwLqSdS
